# SQLHttp

This is a CLR UDF that allows you to make HTTP requests from SQL server

![screenshot](https://httpsimage.com/v2/986eed02-c279-4820-a910-69c81326a51c.png)

-- Installation Instructions

EXEC sp_changedbowner 'sa'
ALTER DATABASE [<your database here>] SET trustworthy ON

sp_configure 'show advanced options', 1;
GO
RECONFIGURE;
GO

sp_configure 'clr enabled', 1;
GO
RECONFIGURE;
GO

CREATE ASSEMBLY [HttpDb] AUTHORIZATION [dbo]
FROM 
WITH PERMISSION_SET = UNSAFE

CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[http] (@url [nvarchar](MAX))
RETURNS [nvarchar](MAX)
AS EXTERNAL NAME [HttpDb].[UserDefinedFunctions].[http];
